benchmark_details.name: MEGA SCIENCE
benchmark_details.overview: MEGA SCIENCE is a large-scale mixture of high-quality open-source datasets consisting of 1.25 million instances, developed through systematic ablation studies to identify optimal subsets for scientific reasoning tasks across various benchmarks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To advance open-source post-training datasets for scientific reasoning and improve the performance of language models in scientific tasks.

data.source: Derived from 12k university-level scientific textbooks and other public datasets.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on the performance of models fine-tuned on datasets from MEGA SCIENCE.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance on scientific reasoning tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared against models fine-tuned with other datasets.
methodology.validation: Evaluation was conducted across 15 benchmarks for reproducibility.
